entry.tran: 跨文化的;涉及多种文化的
entry.def: Cross-cultural means involving two or more different cultures.

example.ex: Minority cultures within the United States often raised issues of cross-cultural conflict.
example.tran: 美国的少数民族文化经常引发跨文化冲突问题。

means.word_mean: 1. dealing with or comparing two or more cultures;
